item.description:
The Manchester Historical Society will co-host the 29th annual Cheney Historic District Walking Tour, which starts at 1:30 p.m. May 13 in front of Cheney Hall.

The tour will consist of the mill area and parts of the west side of Manchester. It will take about 2 hours. Parking is available in the Cheney Hall parking lot.

John Sutherland, professor emeritus of history at Manchester Community College, will lead the tour. The tour is sponsored by Manchester Community College's Institute of Local History and the Cheney Historic District Commission, in addition to the historical society.

It will end with a visit to the society's Old Manchester Museum at 126 Cedar St., where free refreshments will be available. The tour is free. For more information, call 860-647-9983.

***No official Hiking group leadership will be at this event. This event is provided for your edification and enjoyment.***

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Walking Tour Of Historic District of Manchester CT
